artist: Artist: Aristide Maillol; Printer: Philippe Gonin; Publisher: Philippe Gonin et Cie., Paris
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: paper cover with text on front with image in red of squatting figure putting on a garment and nude woman sitting on a rock in front of a tree on back, also in red; loose interior plates all printed in red, in linear style, of figures (mostly nude women) and foliage
markings:
on cover, in pencil: P.G. (?)
on cover, in pencil: H.C. IV
medium: Woodcuts in sanguine ink, letterpress; loose as issued
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
signed: on cover, in black: M (inside a circle)
title: Les Odes D'Horace
